data.name: GREYMEN: A Post-Apocalyptic Band Reunion
data.detailed_description:
Find the lost instruments and reunite the band GREYMEN.

Key Features:

  • EXPLORE AND SURVIVE!
    An atmospheric wasteland to explore. Deadly lakes, rotten deserts and dangerous hills! Dark & beautiful hand-drawn flora & fauna. Hand-painted textures.
  • TURN-BASED BATTLES!
    An army of rescued cats and dogs helps your quest on hex based battle maps. Slay stylish roamers and collect the teeth of the mutants in the underground. Mutant teeth - the currency of the wastes. Buy random weapons with game-play changing powers. Thousands of possible combinations.
  • LOOT!
    Boomboxes, cassettes, Grobo beer bottles. Find and collect hidden items to gain the edge in the underground battles.
  • ITS ABOUT THE BAND!
    The show must go on! Early Access players will have to find the bass guitar and the keyboards in the hidden corners of the desert. The full game will have guitars, drums, amps and mics.

Join us now and help shape the future of GREYMEN: A Post-Apocalyptic Band Reunion.

Art by Roland Seer, programming by Rain Pohlak.

data.short_description: A unique blend of exploration and strategy. Travel in a handcrafted wasteland and fight mutants underground.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5/i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD7750 or GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 3638 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit is supported

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy GREYMEN: A Post-Apocalyptic Band Reunion
